review: So easy to use.  I had the Chromecast and had issues setting it up and using.  This was a breeze!
author: Mike G

review: Not a fan of the fire stick, everything about it is slow you hit the back button and wait and then it goes back 5 times and you have to start over. I also have a roku and it works much faster and is easy to work.
author: Jessica Saxton

review: We've had zero problems with our Firestick and could not be happier with cutting cable. We love the shows you get with prime an accessing netflix is a breeze!!!
author: Stewart Aadnes

review: Worked as soon as i got it set up. Met all my expectations.
author: Leonetta  Mercer

review: easy set up, fast response. saw and linked to my internet connection in a flash.Love it!
author: William Robinson

review: Only complaint was the sign up for Sling through Amazon. It only lets me use Sling on the Fire Stick , not on my Roku stick.
author: oneniner

review: Very user friendly and the remote responds instantly with my TV
author: Elisha M Miller

review: I love it! The only issue I'm having right now is the fact that I can't get the phone app to recognize the fire stick. I think it is just a settings issue that I am sure I will have figured out shortly.
author: Gregory Whisenhunt

review: Easy set up right out of the box. So far, so good.
author: L. Paul
